name: OPERATION: GET BICHES!
description:
You're visiting a town where your childhood friend currently stays at but while in the train ride there, you remembered that you promised your past self to celebrate Valentines with a partner so now it is your mission to find your special someone to be your Valentines in that town. 

But will you be able to in just a few days?

☆♡☆♡☆♡☆ FEATURES
  •  Nameable Protagonist 
  • 4 main love interest...?
  • Everyone is an idiot in disguise
  • 12 Endings
  • Stupid options
☆♡☆♡☆♡☆ WARNING
  • Swearing...

Yeah that's about it I think?

Does mentions of crime count?

☆♡☆♡☆♡☆ NOTES

Yes, it is spelt without the 'T' on purpose.

Some BGs and CGs are... inconsistent

OPERATION: GET BICHES is a romance visual novel game that started development on January 3 and was created as a challenge to be completed before / until February 14, Valentines day and I could proudly say...

I failed the challenge

BUT ANYWAY I TRYED TO FINISH IT BEFORE FEBRUARY ENDS SO HERE WE ARE

As someone who doesn't know much about Romance, I had fun while struggling with the script writing. I honestly think I was on crack. 

I also just learnt Ren'Py when I started.

☆♡☆♡☆♡☆

Thank you for checking this out and if you played this game, thank you for playing!

I'd also like to thank my Discord friends for supporting me through the development of this game and giving me some ideas. Especially our Monarch of Agony. Tho... I couldn't finish it and ended up giving yall an incomplete mess.

This is my first game I ever made and I hope you enjoyed it cuz despite difficulties, I had fun making it. 

Who would've thought I would officially feature my ocs as love interests in a romance vn...
